titles.title: Presidential Honors Scholarship Act of 1996

To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to authorize Presidential Honors Scholarships to be awarded to all secondary school students in the top 5 percent of their graduating class, to promote and recognize high academic achievement in secondary school, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 9/27/1996--Introduced. Presidential Honors Scholarship Act of 1996 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to authorize the award of Presidential Honors Scholarships to all students who graduate in the top five percent of their secondary school graduating class. Authorizes appropriations.
